## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT3G46640](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT3G46640)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>LUX, PCL1</u>
- **Gene Name:** LUX ARRHYTHMO, PHYTOCLOCK 1
- **Description:**   Homeodomain-like superfamily protein;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** locus:2075200
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*

## Germplasm Phenotype:
   - [lux-1]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;Long hypocotyl.  Plants flower early in short- and long-day conditions.  Arrhythmic CAB2:LUC (reporter gene) expression and leaf movement in constant light, monochromatic red or blue light.  Arrhythmic CCR2::LUC (reporter gene) expression in constant dark and constant light.
   - [lux-2]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;Long hypocotyl.  Plants flower early in short- and long-day conditions.  Arrhythmic CAB2:LUC (reporter gene) expression and leaf movement in constant light, monochromatic red or blue light.
   - [lux-3]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;Long hypocotyl seedlings.   Arrhythmic CAB2::LUC (reporter gene) expression under constant light.
   - [lux-4]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;Long hypocotyl seedlings.   Arrhythmic CAB2::LUC (reporter gene) expression under constant light.
   - [lux-5]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;Long hypocotyl seedlings.   Arrhythmic CAB2::LUC (reporter gene) expression under constant light.
